::Lord Elder/Kup::
   
  Elder stepped to the side still trying to raise someone in the city.
   
  Kup looked at Nightlight.
   
  Kup: Here, Nightlight. I don't think he's dead just in stasis or something similar. Cyclonus stripped the Matrix from him.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Nighlight :

Nightlight landed in th island and she was able to heard call to 
Kenzo. She was in shock and just able to said "Where is he...? is 
he..."

She couldnt finished and tears were fallng from her eyes 

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup/Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder was still waiting for Perseus when Kup spoke.
> 
> Kup: He needs medical attention and I don't think we should move 
him. I wish Ratchet was around.
> 
> Kup opens a channel.
> 
> Kup: Kup to kenzo. Rodimus needs medical aid asap. We're on the 
island off the Atlantis coast.
>
